thread.title: BRIEF-Wheeler Announces Acquisition Of Janaf Shopping Yard in Virginia

title: BRIEF-Wheeler Announces Acquisition Of Janaf Shopping Yard in Virginia

organizations.name: janaf shopping yard in virginia reuters
wheeler real estate investment trust inc

text:
15 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Wheeler Announces Acquisition Of Janaf Shopping Yard in Virginia Reuters Staff 
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Wheeler Real Estate Investment Trust Inc : 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST, INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF JANAF SHOPPING YARD IN NORFOLK, VIRGINIA 
* WHEELER REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST INC - ‍PURCHASE PRICE OF $85.65 MILLION OR $96 PER SQUARE FOOT​ 
* WHEELER REIT - ‍FINANCED DEAL USING CASH, ASSUMPTION OF ABOUT $58.9 MILLION OF MORTGAGE LOANS SECURED BY PROPERTY AND ISSUANCE OF COMMON STOCK​ OF CO 
* WHEELER REIT - ‍ALSO ASSUMED A SEPARATE LOAN WITH A $5.2 MILLION BALANCE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
